description:
Getting trapped in the gym storage room might give Oota the chance to get a rise out of Kashiwada.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Class with Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun / Oniwarada-sensei`s Class / Oota-kun and Tabuchi-san`s Battle / Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun in the Gym Storage Room
Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun no Jugyou / Oniwarada-sensei no Jugyou / Oota-kun to Tabuchi-san no Battle / Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun to Taiiku Souko
柏田さんと太田君の授業 / 鬼藁田先生の授業 / 太田君と田淵さんのバトル / 柏田さんと太田君と体育倉庫
